column6: There's no other way to say it: In this issue...Spider-Man's  entire life is completely destroyed. Read the series that has fans and critics hooked as Brian Michael Bendis and David Lafuente rock out another unbelievable issue! Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:David Lafuente Garcia | colorist:Justin Ponsor
